description: Read any previously uploaded file seamlessly from JigsawStack File Storage and use it in your AI applications.

api_key.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

key.info: The key used to retrieve the file from JigsawStack File Storage.

errors.import_error: JigsawStack package not found. Please install it using: pip install jigsawstack>=0.2.7
errors.empty_key: Key is required to read a file from JigsawStack File Storage.

logs.downloading_file: Downloading file from JigsawStack storage - Key: {key}
logs.file_saved: File saved to temporary path: {path} (Size: {size} bytes, Extension: {extension})
logs.analyzing_binary: Analyzing binary content for file type detection
